title: Making A Batman Game Without Batman - Gotham Knights Interview
description:
Tamoor Hussain sat down with Gotham Knight's Executive Producer and Game Director to get the scoop on the latest Gotham adventure. The developers break down Nightwing's playstyle and touch on how they wrote a Batman game without Batman.

In this Summer Game Fest interview, Tamoor chatted with Fleur Marty, the Executive Producer, and Geoff Ellenor, the Game Director. They talked about the challenges of creating a cooperative narrative, how Nightwing plays in Gotham Knights, and how he fits into the story.

Gotham Knights releases on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X | S, and PC on October 25, 2022. The cooperative DC game was also supposed to hit PS4 and Xbox One, but those versions were cancelled. For more Summer Game Fest coverage, stay tuned to GameSpot.

#summergamefest #gothamknights

title: New PS5 Pro Controller May Be Revealed Soon | GameSpot News
description:
PS5 might be getting a new pro controller, Fallout 5 is coming after Elder Scroll 6 and the Overwatch 2 beta begins June 16.
#GamingNews #PS5 #fallout5 

According to a new report, Sony is releasing a PlayStation 5 pro controller with removable analog sticks and rear paddle triggers, similar to the Xbox Elite controller. The report also claims Sony will reveal new hardware--but not a new console--at the end of June, though it's unclear if this rumored new controller may be part of that. 

Bethesda's Todd Howard has confirmed that the studio plans to work on Fallout 5 following the completion of The Elder Scrolls VI. During a new interview Howard spoke about what the studio has planned after Starfield, and he touched on the progress of The Elder Scrolls VI by stating that the project was still in pre-production.

STAMPS
00:00 - INTRO
00:06 - PS5 Pro Controller
00:58 - Fallout 5
02:06 - Overwatch 2
02:19 - FF7 Anniversary

title: TMNT: Shredder's Revenge Casey Jones Gameplay
description:
Fan favorite character Casey Jones was recently revealed as a playable character in the most recent DotEmu beat 'em up Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge and we have the first 11 minutes of gameplay for you to check out!

The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles are no strangers to being put into great arcade beat 'em ups and the latest one from DotEmu is no exception. This time not only are Leonardo, Donatello, Michelangelo, and Rafael all coming back but they brought some friends with them as well! Aside from the turtles players can finally play as their wise teacher and father figure Master Splinter, their best friend and occasional pizza supplier April O'Niel, and also fan favorite Casey Jones who brings his all of his favorite, even iconic sports equipment along with him to keep back any villains who are unfortunate enough to find themselves on the business end of his hockey stick. All of these characters return with classing moves and throws and even have some new ones to make sure the beat downs stay fresh.

Casey Jones himself is a character you can't use at the beginning of the game. To unlock Casey Jones you have to finish story mode once, which shouldn't be too difficult of a task. Once you lay the smack down on the last boss you'll get a notification that you have unlocked the hockey mask wearing hero to play in all of the games modes!

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge is available on June 16th, 2022 on Windows, Steam, Linux, Nintendo Switch, Playstation 4, and Xbox One.

#tmnt #gaming #gamespot

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge Review
description: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge is a love letter to Turtles in Time that modernizes the classic beat-'em-up while retaining its 16-bit essence.

title: Apex Legends Lifeline Cinematic Trailer - Stories from the Outlands
description:
Check out the latest Stories from the Outlands for Apex Legends which focus's on Lifeline. Learn more about her and Octane in this new cinematic trailer.

As a member of the Frontier Corps, Ajay Che hoped to set herself apart from her infamous family of war profiteers. But to help those in need, sometimes lines must be crossed.

Apex Legends is a free-to-play hero shooter game where legendary characters battle for glory, fame, and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier. Play for free now on PlayStation® 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC via Origin and Steam.

#apexlegends #gaming

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla - Forgotten Saga Trailer (Free Game Mode)
description:
Check out the Forgotten Saga a new free rogue-lite mode coming to Assassin's Creed Valhalla in this trailer that was shown off during the Assassin's Creed 15th Anniversary.

#gaming #assassinscreed

title: Assassin’s Creed 15th Anniversary Celebration Livestream
description:
Assassin’s Creed is celebrating its 15th anniversary! To celebrate the 15th anniversary tune in to get a special look at the future of Assassin’s Creed Valhalla, a look back at the franchise, and a tease of what’s to come this year. The Ubisoft News team will show off Assassin’s Creed Origin’s new 60 FPS gameplay update with producer, Jose Araiza. After that they will take a look at the news and updates regarding all the latest and upcoming Assassin’s Creed comics, graphic novels, Manga, and more in Assassin’s Creed Stories.

#assassinscreed #gaming

title: Callisto Protocol Gameplay Captured on Next Gen Hardware (Game in Development)
description:
Check out Callisto Protocol official gameplay captured on Next Gen Hardware by Striking Distance Studios. The game is still in development, so what you see is not final.

#callistoprotocol #gaming

title: Fall Guys Spartan Showdown Trailer | Xbox Games Showcase Extended 2022
description:
The all new Fall Guys trailer recreates the iconic Halo 3 ad, and serves as a very appropriate way to announce all new Halo themed cosmetics coming to the multiplayer obstacle course game. The pack is titled Spartan Showdown. 

#xbox #fallguys

title: Forza Horizon 5: Hot Wheels Game Overview | Xbox Games Showcase Extended 2022
description:
Hot Wheels are back in Forza Horizon for the first time since the expansion to 2016's Horizon 3. This crossover will have 10 new cars, 4 new biomes, and over 200km of track. The Hot Wheels expansion will be available on July 19, 2022.

#xbox #forza5 #gaming

title: High On Life Game Overview with Squanch Games | Xbox Games Showcase Extended 2022
description:
Justin Roiland and Squanch Games speak about their new action adventure metroidvania first person shooter, High On Life. Humans are being sold and its up to the player to stop the bad guys with a selection of talking guns.  

#xbox #highonlife #gaming

title: Microsoft Flight Simulator Behind The Scenes Look | Xbox Games Showcase Extended 2022
description:
Microsoft's longest running game franchise is adding new aircrafts to fly around the world like helicopters, gliders, and a brand new airline, as well as new airports and missions. Behind the scenes, Parris Lilly and head of Microsoft Flight Simulator, Jörg Neumann, walked around the Air and Space Museum to go over some of the free updates and planes coming to the game.

#xbox #microsoftflightsimulator

title: Minecraft Legends Deep Dive | Xbox Games Showcase Extended 2022
description:
Minecraft Legends is an action strategy game that takes place in the Minecraft universe. Dennis Ries of Mojang Studios breaks down the game's story and gameplay during Xbox Games Showcase Extended 2022.  

#xbox #minecraft #gaming

title: Modern Warfare 2 Beta Information May Have Leaked | GameSpot News
description:
Modern Warfare 2’s beta could take place in August, Diablo 4’s game director explains why there are no new classes, and Starfield reveals the protagonist is silent.

#GamingNews #MW2 #Starfield

Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 is getting a beta, and according to an Amazon product page, it could be coming in August. The page for MW2 on PS5 says players who preorder will receive their beta code in August. The Xbox Series X|S page gets a little more specific and says those who preorder by August 15 will unlock early access to the open beta.

Last week Diablo 4 game director Joe Shely revealed why the game doesn’t have any brand new classes. According to Shely, the decision came down to player expectations and making sure that aspects fans remember from previous Diablo games are present in Diablo IV, albeit in a new, modern form.

Bethesda confirmed that you'll be a silent protagonist on its official Twitter account. Fan reaction seems split. Some have expressed disappointment in the silent protagonist trope, saying it breaks immersion. Others say they prefer silence, as opposed to hearing a performance of a line you just read.

STAMPS
00:00 - Intro
00:06 - Modern Warfare 2
00:45 - Diablo 4
01:21 - Starfield

title: Pete Hines Talks Starfield, Redfall, ESO & Fallout 76 | Xbox Games Showcase Extended 2022
description:
Pete Hines sat down during the Xbox Games Showcase Extended to talk about what makes Starfield a true Bethesda game experience. He detailed the emphasis on player choice, and how Bethesda is giving the player tools to play however they want, whether that's guns blazing, exploring its 1,000 worlds, or just following the story. 

#xbox #starfield #bethesda #gaming

title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R  2  Heart of Chornobyl — Enter the Zone Official Trailer | XBox Game Showcase Extended
description:
We got an look at the long anticipated S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl's intro cinematic. It gave us a small glimpse into its grim setting, and some of the mystery that awaits. The game is expected to release in 2022 for Xbox Series X|S, and day one on Xbox Game Pass.

#xbox #gaming #stalker2

title: Slime Rancher 2 Gameplay | Xbox Games Showcase Extended 2022
description:
During the Xbox Games Showcase Extended, we got an in-depth look of Slime Rancher 2's wholesome gameplay, and some of the new environments the player will be traversing. Slime Rancher 2 is expected to release for Xbox Series consoles fall 2022.

#xbox #slimerancher2 #gaming

Pete Hines sat down during the Xbox Games Showcase Extended to talk about what makes Starfield a true Bethesda game experience. He detailed the emphasis on player choice, and how Bethesda is giving the player tools to play however they want, whether that's guns blazing, exploring its 1,000 worlds, or just following the story. 

#starfield #xbox #bethesda

title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre Unrated Gameplay Trailer
description:
Tobe Hooper's horror classic, Texas Chainsaw Massacre, is becoming an asymmetrical multiplayer game. The trailer gives us a look at the many characters you'll be able to play, including Leatherface himself. The game is expected to be released in 2023.

#xbox #texaschainsawmassacre #gaming

title: Valheim Console Announcement Trailer (Xbox and Microsoft Store)
description:
Valheim is coming to Microsoft Store and Xbox! It will be available with PC Game Pass in fall 2022, and with Xbox Game Pass in early 2023. There will be full crossplay support between Xbox, Microsoft and Steam.

Valheim is made by developer Iron Gate, published by Coffee Stain Publishing. Porting for Microsoft Store and Xbox has been made by developers Piktiv and Fishlabs.

#valheim #xbox

description:

title: Xbox Games Showcase Extended 2022 Livestream
description:
Check out the Xbox Games Extended Showcase today at 10AM PT, 1PM ET for even more reveals.

We'll be getting a glimpse at new trailers, deeper looks at the news from the Xbox & Bethesda Games Showcase, and insight from some of your favorite game creators as part of the event. The Xbox showcase 2022 extended is looking have a run time of about 90 minutes.

#xbox #gaming #summergamefest
